text: The Volkswagen Jetta Mk2 is the second generation of the Volkswagen Jetta. It successed the Mk1 in 1984, and were in 1992 successed by the Vento. == Engines == === Petrol === ==== Carburetted ==== * 1.3 40 kW (55 hp) * 1.6 51 kW (70 hp), 53 kW (72 hp) and 55 kW (75 hp) * 1.8 62 kW (84 hp) and 66 kW (90 hp) ==== Fuel-injected ==== * 1.3 40 kW (55 hp) * 1.8 66 kW (90 hp) * 1.8 Syncro 72 kW (98 hp) * 1.8 GT 79 kW (107 hp) and 82 kW (112 hp) * 1.8 GT 16V 95 kW (129 hp) and 102 kW (139 hp) * 2.0 16V 100 kW (136 hp) === Diesel === * 1.6 D 40 kW (54 hp) * 1.6 TD 44 kW (60 hp), 51 kW (70 hp) and 59 kW (80 hp) Jetta Mk2 Category:1980s automobiles Category:1990s automobiles
title: Volkswagen Jetta Mk2
